item.title: Ottawa PSE Coalition Meeting: Feb 26
item.description: Tuesday, February 26 6-8 pm 338 Somerset Street West (Side entrance) Add to Calendar

item.title: Ryerson University Campus Coalition Meeting: Feb 13
item.description: Wednesday, February 13 4-6pm Venn (RCC 103). Contact the coalition at Ryerson at wearethestudentsRU@gmail.com. Coalition Meeting Invitation We Are The Students Ryerson would like to invite you and your members to attend our upcoming coalition meeting. We are a group of students and community members that are concerned about the announced changes to OSAP and post-secondary funding as well as how student fees will be collected. We know that these changes will cause uncertain work conditions for staff and faculty, less access to education and lower the value of studentsâ€™ education.
